mdRecord.dcterms:title: Eleventh Hour Lies in the Floyd Press
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A statement written by Robert J. Noell disputing the information published in a Floyd Press article. The article had stated he sold land to the Highway Commission for a right of way, and he maintains that the right of way had been established and he gave additional width when it was requested without receiving payment.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Land use
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
